description: This intermediate-level course assumes students have a substantial understanding of ceramic processes, plus a good awareness of their own interests in the realm of ceramic expression. The instructor helps students focus their efforts by proposing specific areas of investigation. Prerequisite: Art 103 or 207. Previous studio experience in ceramics is accepted when approved by the instructor. Materials fee. Offered annually.
name: Intermediate Ceramics
prerequisites: Art 103 or 207. Previous studio experience in ceramics is accepted when approved by the instructor. Materials fee. Offered annually.
